content.raw: Sometimes it will email everyone who has ever had a gazebo pull request merged. This happens if our `-any-` job alternates between an release branch and default, since it thinks years of commits are "new". This PR should filter out non- osrfoundation.org emails from that list (see GenericMail.groovy:119-133). But we also have an opt-out list that I can add you to if you prefer.
content.html: Sometimes it will email everyone who has ever had a gazebo pull request merged. This happens if our -any- job alternates between an release branch and default, since it thinks years of commits are "new". This PR should filter out non- osrfoundation.org emails from that list (see GenericMail.groovy:119-133). But we also have an opt-out list that I can add you to if you prefer.
